name: Little Slices of Death
description:
Little Slices of Death is a single-player RPG that aims to face the player with difficult moral decisions in a short, unique story about Edith, a young otter hero.

The player takes the role of a reaper, who acts as a guide for Edith and helps her deal with moral conflicts. Together, Edith and the reaper explore the forested world and villages, helping Edith find people and put her identity as a hero to use. However, upon facing conflicts, Edith learns that making the right choice is not always so easy or straightforward.
